english.segment1: Verse 1: I will sing. I will sing. I will sing. I will sing. Of His goodness. And His kindness. And His mercy. I will sing (Repeat)
english.segment2: Chorus: Holy,holy. Glory to the Lamb. Singing Praises to the awesome God. Ever I will sing
english.segment3: Verse 2: Let us sing. Let us sing. Let us sing. Let us sing. Of His goodness. And His kindness. And His mercy. Let us sing
english.segment4: Chorus: Holy,holy. Glory to the Lamb. Singing Praises to the awesome God. Ever I will sing
english.segment5: Verse 3: We will sing. We will sing. We will sing. We will sing. Of His goodness. And His kindness. And His mercy. We will sing
english.segment6: Chorus: Holy,holy. Glory to the Lamb. Singing Praises to the awesome God. Ever I will sing
english.segment7: Vamp: Sing His praises in the morning. Brand new mercy every dawning. Melody, harmony. I will sing (Repeat till fade)
